name: The Whimsical Archer
description:
"F'r the fate of the arch'r is far from whimsical" Being a monarch does come with its need for entertainment! Lucky for his majesty, he's got a bundle of archers! The deal is "Get 20 shots and be free" He did not make it easy though

This is my submission for the 1-Button Jam 2019. I was successful in creating a game in almost 2 days and hope you guys will like it.

"to giveth credit wh're credit's due" Art Assets:Platformer Tileset: https://foxlybr.itch.io/23421124244CouchFerret Asset Pack: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp5WDvPDLCkSZWp9hP5xIvQSound and Music:

Also huge thanks to @buckbeak for helping me with the last peg of the race.

As usual, Any feedback is highly appreciated!
